product_name: Dalbello Gaia 4 Ski Boots - Junior Girls' - 2012/2013
long_description: These Dalbello Gaia 4 girls' ski boots offer your little shredder the comfort and performance she deserves. Transparent shell lets her see the workings of the liner inside, just like the latest style in high-performance adult boots. Supercomfort liner system brings soft, warm, extremely comfortable support to small feet. All 4 buckles are microadjustable, so young skiers can dial in the fit for comfort and performance. Cuff strap acts as an additional buckle, letting the user adjust tightness around the upper ankle. The Dalbello Gaia 4 ski boots offer a flex index appropriate for lightweight skiers.
short_description: These Dalbello Gaia 4 girls' ski boots offer your little shredder the comfort and performance she deserves.
